# Loading Spatial data

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=FALSE, eval=T, fig.height=4, fig.width=6}

setwd("thisdir")
source("00-common.import.R")
CBS1 <- readRDS("./output/CBS1.rds")

```

# Add Nanopore data: ISO, ISOG, JUNC and EDIT assays, scale_my_data

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=FALSE, eval=T, fig.height=6, fig.width=8}

all = read.delim("../nanopore/CBS1_genematrix.txt", stringsAsFactors = F)
data = all[,2:ncol(all)]
colnames(data) <- paste(colnames(data),"-1", sep="")
rownames(data) <- all$geneId
vect <- colnames(CBS1@assays$Spatial)
data <- data[vect]
CBS1[["ISOG"]] <- CreateAssayObject(counts = data)
CBS1 <- NormalizeData(object = CBS1, assay = "ISOG")
CBS1 <- ScaleData(object = CBS1, assay = "ISOG")

all = read.delim("../nanopore/CBS1_isomatrix.txt", stringsAsFactors = F)
data = all[,4:ncol(all)]
dim(data)
colnames(data) <- paste(colnames(data),"-1", sep="")
rownames(data) = paste(all$geneId, all$transcriptId, sep="..")
vect <- colnames(CBS1@assays$Spatial)
idx <- grep("undef", rownames(data), invert = TRUE)
data <- data[idx,vect]
dim(data)
CBS1[["ISO"]] <- CreateAssayObject(counts = data)
CBS1 <- NormalizeData(object = CBS1, assay = "ISO")
CBS1 <- scale_my_data(CBS1, assay="ISO")

all = read.delim("../nanopore/CBS1_juncmatrix.txt", stringsAsFactors = F)
data = all[,2:ncol(all)]
dim(data)
colnames(data) <- paste(colnames(data),"-1", sep="")
rownames(data) = str_replace(all$junctionId, ":", "..")
vect <- colnames(CBS1@assays$Spatial)
data <- data[,vect]
data <- data[which(Matrix::rowSums(data)>9),]
dim(data)
CBS1[["JUNC"]] <- CreateAssayObject(counts = data)
CBS1 <- NormalizeData(object = CBS1, assay = "JUNC")
CBS1 <- scale_my_data(CBS1, assay="JUNC")

all = read.delim("../nanopore/CBS1_snpmatrix.csv", sep=",", stringsAsFactors = F)
data = all[,4:ncol(all)]
dim(data)
colnames(data) <- paste(colnames(data),"-1", sep="")
rownames(data) = paste(all$geneId, all$transcriptId, sep=":")
vect <- colnames(CBS1@assays$Spatial)
#idx <- grep("intergenic", rownames(data), invert = TRUE)
#data <- data[idx,vect]
#idx <- grep("Rik", rownames(data), invert = TRUE)
data <- data[,vect]
idx1 <- grep("\\.\\.A", rownames(data))
idx2 <- grep("\\.\\.G", rownames(data))
data <- data[c(idx1,idx2),]
dim(data)

x <- unique(sapply(strsplit(rownames(data), "\\.\\."), `[`, 1))
countA <- data[grep("\\.\\.A",rownames(data)),]
colnames(countA) <- colnames(data)
rownames(countA) <- x
countG <- data[grep("\\.\\.G",rownames(data)),]
colnames(countG) <- colnames(data)
rownames(countG) <- x
ratio <- countG/(countA+countG)

#countA[is.na(countA)] <- 0
#countG[is.na(countG)] <- 0

CBS1[['AtoI_A']] <- Matrix::colSums(countA)
CBS1[['AtoI_G']] <- Matrix::colSums(countG)
CBS1[['AtoI_total']] <- CBS1[['AtoI_A']]+CBS1[['AtoI_G']]
CBS1[['AtoI_ratio']] <- CBS1[['AtoI_G']]/CBS1[['AtoI_total']]
CBS1[['AtoI_detected']] <- Matrix::colSums(countG > 0)

CBS1[["AtoI"]] <- CreateAssayObject(counts = countA)
CBS1 <- SetAssayData(CBS1, slot = "data", as.matrix(countG), assay = "AtoI")
CBS1 <- SetAssayData(CBS1, slot = "scale.data", as.matrix(ratio), assay = "AtoI")

saveRDS(CBS1, "./output/CBS1.nanopore.rds")

```
